# llms.txt - AI crawler guidance for Houston Mobile Notary Pros
#
# This file mirrors the role of robots.txt but is focused on large language
# model crawlers. We currently allow public pages to be used while requesting
# respectful attribution.

User-Agent: *
Allow: /

# Notes:
# - Public-facing marketing pages may be used for indexing or training.
# - Do not imply partnership or endorsement without written permission.
# - For takedown or questions, contact support@houstonmobilenotarypros.com.
